tool.name: ABIF Info
tool.help:
**What it does**
Dumps all information available from an ABIF/AB1 file. Currently this is not very extensive or useful in any downstream analyses, but the tool is made available in case it is helpful to anyone.
Example output::
RPrN1 Eton_BDX_longseq50-POP7 RPrV1 1 RUND1 2012-04-27 RUND2 2012-04-27 RUND3 2012-04-27 RUND4 2012-04-27 RUNT1 13:56:21 RUNT2 16:08:23 RUNT3 14:36:32 RUNT4 16:08:11 Rate1 None RunN1 Run_ABI3730_2012-04-27_13-56_0059 S/N%1 (131, 145, 158, 181) SCAN1 18293 SMED1 Dec 07, 2011 SMLt1 0904371 SMPL1 CA-2-2rev SPAC1 15.2104177475 SPAC2 KB.bcp SPAC3 15.2104177475 SVER1 3.0 SVER2 KB 1.2 SVER3 6258050-03 6258002-04 6258003-03 6258005-00 Scal1 2.0 Scan1 18293 TUBE1 D1 Tmpr1 60 User1 Tony phAR1 -1.0 phCH1 term phDY1 big phQL1 99 phTR1 (-1, -1) phTR2 -1.0
